name: NO! I'M DRIVING
description:
NO! I'M DRIVING is like Starfox meets QWOP meets CO-OP action! 

Drive a whacky ship sharing its control with a friend(if we still got any after playing!), or take control alone. Dodge obstacles, gather money for your vacation, avoid crashing, and most importantly: stablish who's driving and who's riding shotgun!

Use W and S to control the Left Wing, Up Arrow and Down Arrow for the Right Wing, or customize your controls in the main menu! 

After trying out the demo, please leave us some feedback! You can also join our Discord and chat directly with us!

Make sure to share the controls with someone else for maximum fun!
